gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 125, Pistons 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeat the Pistons, 125-111.  LeBron James led the way with 25 points and eight assists for the Lakers, while Anthony Davis added 20 points, 14 rebounds and six blocks in the victory.  Ausar Thompson tallied 19 points for the Pistons in the losing effort.  The Lakers improve to 29-26 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 8-45.
